public abstract class AeAbstractXMLDBStorageProvider
extends AeAbstractXMLDBStorage
implements IAeStorageProvider

Base class for all XMLDB storage providers.

getXMLDBTransactionManagerConnection

protected IAeXMLDBConnection getXMLDBTransactionManagerConnection()
                                                           throws AeStorageException
Convenience method to return a Transaction manager XMLDB connection. If the current thread is not participating in an active transaction, then a normal (with autocommit) connection is returned.

Throws:
AeStorageException
